name: Inertia Drift: One
description:
A new chaotic racing simulator in development.

This game is in a very early stage of development.

Notable features :
  • Weather system (storm simulation)
  • Motion mechanics and effects
  • Realistic game physics

It uses some open source assets and materials for a rapid trial version.

List of open source assets used :
  • Vehicle Physics Pro : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/vehicle-physics-pro-communit...
  • Unity Standard Assets : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/standard-assets-for...
  • Rocky Hills Environment : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/rocky-hills-env...
  • Auto Grass : https://doctrina-kharkov.blogspot.com/2019/08/unity-automatic-grass-terrain.html 

2020 MuktoDMI, Arubis Cube, Asenturisk
